sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎馒头是游客在上海旅行必尝的食品。

sentences.english: What is more, we have other two factories which are in Shanghai and Suzhou in China to supply the local market.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在上海和苏州也有设厂，以供应当地市场为主。

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我们诚聘充满活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表处。
他们正在上海参观访问。

sentences.english: The wedding expenses in Shanghai are among the highest in the country.
sentences.chinese: 上海的婚嫁消费成本在全国居首位。

sentences.english: Housing prices in Shanghai have doubled.The main index of the Shanghai stock exchange just passed 6,000 - up more than fivefold in two years.
sentences.chinese: 上海的房价已经翻了一倍。

sentences.english: Employee Union Management System for Shanghai Jiefang Daily Newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 上海解放日报工会管理系统。

sentences.english: Shanghai Theater Academy is full of southern graceful and pleasant girls.
sentences.chinese: 上海戏剧学院的美女多是南派气质，婉约可人。

sentences.english: Pudong Development Bank Pudong Branch Office Interior Design, 4,500 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 上海埔东发展银行埔东分行室内设计。

sentences.english: I’d like to have two soft berth tickets to Shanghai for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我想买两张明天的到上海的软卧票。

sentences.english: Fudan University students at their graduation ceremony in Shanghai last month.
sentences.chinese: 上海复旦学子于毕上月毕业礼。

sentences.english: Lotus Supercenter has been widely recognized by Shanghai people.
sentences.chinese: 易初莲花购物中心已经被上海人普遍认可。

sentences.english: This paper is based on the project of the huge shield tunnel a cross the Huangpu River, linking East Fuxing Road in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 以上海复兴东路大型越江盾构隧道为工程背景。

sentences.english: Shanghai provides direst flights to more than 60 cities in the world.
sentences.chinese: 上海的国际航班可直达全国上60多座都会。

sentences.english: Shanghai All-light Photoelectric Technology Inc. (SALPT) is a professional manufacturer for the production of guiding marker and super-thin light box.
sentences.chinese: 上海奥丽光电专业生产标识导向，导光板超薄灯箱。

sentences.english: Duolun Road, formerly named Darroch Road, is a little street in Hongkou District of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 多伦路，原名窦乐安路，是上海虹口区的一条小街。
